whatIsAdsok.question: What is AdsOK?
whatIsAdsok.answer: AdsOK is an online advertising platform that connects advertisers with website owners to create the best business opportunities for both parties.

howToRegister.question: How do I register?
howToRegister.answer: Click the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner of the website, fill in your information, and choose your account type (advertiser or website owner).

payment.question: How do I pay for advertising?
payment.answer: We only accept cryptocurrency payments for security and speed. You can pay using USDT or TRON.

approval.question: Do ads need approval?
approval.answer: Yes, all ads must be reviewed by our team before they start showing to ensure they comply with our policies.

earnings.question: When do I receive earnings?
earnings.answer: We pay earnings on the 1st and 15th of each month, automatically transferred to your specified crypto wallet.

traffic.question: What's the minimum traffic requirement?
traffic.answer: Your website should have at least 1,000 daily visitors and quality content that meets our policies.

adCode.question: How do I install the ad code?
adCode.answer: After your website is approved, you'll receive an installation code. Place it in the <head> section of your website or install it through your tag manager.

reporting.question: How can I view reports?
reporting.answer: Log in to your dashboard to see real-time reports, historical statistics, and download reports in various formats.

needHelp.title: Couldn't find what you're looking for?
